segments.text: As I look closer, I see the water pouring over the sink's edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost mesmerizing, but also quite alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even seem to care; she’s polishing that plate like it's the only thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a sense of disbelief at how oblivious she is, completely ignoring the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like watching a disaster unfold in slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about all the damage this could cause if someone slips or if she finally notices.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And yet, the garden outside looks so calm, a stark contrast to the brewing storm inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
